text: House Ethics Committee report on George Santos finds “substantial evidence” of wrongdoing  —  Washington — The House Ethics Committee released a long-awaited report on its investigation into embattled Rep. George Santos on Thursday, finding that there was “substantial evidence” of wrongdoing by the congressman.
